content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing coal for smelting
- Ensure to keep a sufficient supply of coal in inventory to insert into the furnaces. Check inventory levels before attempting to smelt iron ore.

### Errors when the furnace is out of fuel
- Monitor the fuel levels in the furnaces regularly. If a furnace is out of fuel, it will not be able to smelt any items. Consider setting up a more automated fuel supply system.

### Errors when trying to smelt without ingredients
- Ensure that the furnaces have both coal and iron ore available before attempting to smelt. If either ingredient is missing, the smelting process cannot occur.
